meanings.definition: A post to which a gate is hinged or fastened.
meanings.sent1: The gatepost held the gate firmly in place.
meanings.sent2: We painted the gatepost to match the color of the fence.
meanings.sent3: The gatepost seemed to be whispering secrets to the gate.
meanings.sent4: The gatepost stood tall like a loyal guardian.
meanings.sent5: The old gatepost creaked in the wind, telling stories of the past.

meanings.definition: A post marking the entrance to a driveway or property.
meanings.sent1: The gatepost at the end of the driveway had a mailbox attached.
meanings.sent2: Cars often slow down near the gatepost to read the address.
meanings.sent3: The gatepost wore a tiny hat to welcome visitors in style.
meanings.sent4: The gatepost stood like a sentinel, watching over the property.
meanings.sent5: The gatepost was decorated with colorful flowers, brightening up the entrance.
